Package dog.giraffe.image

Interface ImageWriter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, Log
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BufferedImageWriter, FileImageWriter
    public interface ImageWriter
extends java.lang.AutoCloseable, Log
    Class to create images as BufferedImages and to write to disk.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static interface  ImageWriter.Factory
      Factory for ImageWriters.
      static interface  ImageWriter.Line
      Contains all the information to write one line of the image.
